'Lewis and Harris' (Scottish Gaelic: 'LeÃ²dhas agus na Hearadh') in the Outer
Hebrides make up the largest island in Scotland. This is the largest single
island of the British Isles after Great Britain and Ireland. List of islands
in the British Isles
